templates.title: OPC UA to MQTT Stack
templates.description: This stack deploys an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router, Mosquitto MQTT broker, and a mqtt management.
templates.note:
This stack sets up an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router for data handling, Mosquitto MQTT broker for messaging, and a management from cedalo.

After deployment, you can access the OPC Router and cedalo management via the exposed ports.http://localhost:40080
templates.name: opcua-to-mqtt

env.name: INITIAL_USERNAME
env.label: Initial Admin User
env.description: The initial username for the OPC Router and cedalo admin user.

env.name: INITIAL_PASSWORD
env.label: Initial Admin Password
env.description: The initial password for the OPC Router and cedalo admin user. The password must be at least 12 characters long.

env.name: OR_I_ACCEPT_EULA
env.label: Accept EULA
env.description: Accept the End User License Agreement

templates.title: OPC UA to InfluxDB Stack
templates.description: This stack deploys an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router, and InfluxDB.
templates.note:
This stack sets up an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router for data handling, and InfluxDB for data storage.

After deployment, you can access the OPC Router and InfluxDB via the exposed ports.http://localhost:40180

templates.title: OPC UA to REST Stack
templates.description: This stack deploys an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router, and a Webhook Tester.
templates.note:
This stack sets up an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router for data handling, and a Webhook Tester for REST endpoint simulation.

After deployment, you can access the OPC Router and Webhook Tester via the exposed ports.http://localhost:40201

env.name: INITIAL_USERNAME

templates.title: MQTT to Email Stack
templates.description: This stack deploys an OPC Router, Mosquitto MQTT broker, and smtp4dev.
templates.note:
This stack sets up an OPC Router for data handling, Mosquitto MQTT broker for messaging, and smtp4dev for email testing.

After deployment, you can access the OPC Router and smtp4dev via the exposed ports.http://localhost:40301

env.name: INITIAL_USERNAME

templates.title: SMB to MQTT Stack
templates.description: This stack deploys an OPC Router, Mosquitto MQTT broker, SMB server, and Filebrowser.
templates.note:
This stack sets up an OPC Router for data handling, Mosquitto MQTT broker for messaging, SMB server for file sharing, and Filebrowser for managing files.

After deployment, you can access the OPC Router and Filebrowser via the exposed ports.http://localhost:40401

env.label: Initial Admin Password
env.description: The initial password for the OPC Router admin user. The password must be at least 12 characters long.
